Suman Jampala

Game Designer - Coder - Writer

Portfolio

About

I enjoy creative approaches to problem solving and process improvement. I have strong analytical and critical thinking skills, and I love to leverage technology to deliver seamless solutions. Some of the technologies I am familiar with are Go, Bash & Java. I am competent in the software development life cycle and I know how to apply those principles in an agile context.

My love for technology is only surpassed by my ability to learn. I believe that learning and adapting are crucial to success.

Hobbies

I enjoy learning about new tech while becoming better at what I already know!
Right now I am refreshing my knowledge in intermediate level physics and mathematics.
I love reading fantasy / science fiction and my favorite book is The Traitor: Baru Cormorant.
I love listening to music while coding / writing and while I like to dip my ear in everything, I particularly like EDM.

Accomplishments

My poetry has been published in Clamor & In Parentheses. I have also taught a course in python at my local library.

Game Design Projects

I designed two games using an 18-card format, and am in the process of designing and developing two more.

Upcoming Projects

As I become better at coding and writing, I hope to expand the scopes in my projects. I believe in pushing myself to thinking big, and I have a cyperpunk MUD in the works, along with a few larger-scoped board game designs.

Extra-curricular Skills

I passed my Arengetram in 2008. I am pushing myself to draw and play the guitar more.
